price: Ibarura ryabo rireba Nyagasani wanjye, iyaba mwari mubizi!
arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā ʿalā rabbī law tashʿurūna
